title: Welcome
desc: Welcome to 'Congregation {{congregation}}' app. Here you can manage the students and monthly schedules as well as phone territories.
messageWarnDesc: You have time to create next schedule until {{until}}.
messageTerWarning: There are {{amount}} territories that has not been worked for more than {{days}} days
messageNoAccessDesc: You do not have access to any part of the application. Please contact with the adminsitrator to get the permissions.
